item.title: In its latest update, Yahoo! introduces cutting-edge search technology to Flickr
item.description:
Yahoo! has introduced several major updates to Flickr, potentially revitalizing the platform. These updates include an improved search engine and simplified access, organization, discovery, and sharing of images and videos across various devices. Over 112 million users, including businesses, will benefit from these enhancements, making it easier to manage their combined 11 billion photos on Flickr. Tim Miller, Head of Engineering at Flickr, expressed their aspiration to create a space for lifelong memories and highlighted the new tools’ role in maximizing the platform’s 1,000 GB storage capacity...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/in-its-latest-update-yahoo-introduces-cutting-edge-search-technology-to-flickr/
